tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (NN vacation) (NN today)) (CC &) (NP (NN tomorrow) (NN :-RRB-)) (ADVP (RB already) (NP (DT half) (NN way)) (PP (IN through) (NP (NNP Christmas) (NN shopping) (NN :-RRB-)))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [today/NN case>on/IN compound>vacation/NN cc>&/CC conj:&>[:-RRB-/NN compound>tomorrow/NN] advmod>[already/RB nmod:npmod>[way/NN det>half/DT] nmod:through>[:-RRB-/NN case>through/IN compound>Christmas/NNP compound>shopping/NN]] punct>!/.]
